trends: There have been no other sightings in Flora Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was inside the lounge room playing ps3 when my friend my house mate and his girlfriend come running through from the back yard saying there's a UFO there's a UFO so i leaped up running to the front yard and shore enough there was a huge orb of light hovering over bendigo victoria in Australia i didn't think to grab a camera because i was shocked that this was happening. but thankfully thousands of people seen and filmed it. it started moving and changing direction like nothing i have ever seen before pulsating with a yellowy whitish colour.It kept moving around for about half an hour before it just vanished like turning off a light about 3 years before this event there was another sighting that i did not see but got front page on the local news paper didn't think anything of it till i seen it for myself.
Summary: pulsating light hovering and changing direction no sound and just disapeared in to thin air
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
